title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run large language models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for the Ollama API; install from PyPI as "ollama".

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as "ollama".

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) providing LLM, embeddings and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: helm-ollama
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app that combines Ollama LLMs with Chroma vector store for private RAG.

title: discord-ollama
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama completions into Discord channels.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (rich + prompt-toolkit) multi-model chat client for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot plugin that routes completions through local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community Node.js wrapper adding caching, retries and TypeScript decorators.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI now supports Ollama backends via plugin system.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that lets workspaces query local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-grafana
summary: Grafana datasource plugin to visualize Ollama API metrics and token throughput.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Community Elixir client (Hex: ollama) with GenServer-based process pooling.
